attributes.action: Charge preachers of hate that encourage mass murder of non believers with inciting genocide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have had enough of vile ranting preachers in this country calling for the mass murder of people because of the colour of their skin , religion, faith or way of life.
These are the definitions of genocide and to call for it is inciteting genocide and they all need to be arrested , charged and dealt with as severly as the vicious vile crime that is.
